title: Cisco employees by region 2010 to 2019
summary: Overall Rest of World is gradually increasing, United States is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. United States, and lastly, 2. Rest of World.
Rest of World reported the highest Number of employees about 37774.0 in Year 2013
The minimum Number of employees about 30587.0, occured at 2012 by Rest of World.
The difference of Number of employees between United States and Rest of World is smaller at Year 2014 compared to the Year 2011.
